name: Welcome to Ataria
description:
Welcome to Ataria is freeware action storytelling game. Story is inspired by Arab Spring and appearance is influenced by early GTA games.

You control three main heroes during revolution in fictitious Arabian country Ataria. The first of them is agent Hall, western spy, who kindle first spark of revolution. Soldier Fareed El-Hasem, loyal to country leader, tries to defend freedom of his country by fighting against rebels. And Civilian Nizar Darzi just wants to protect his family and help others.

There are storytelling parts about revolutionary events and action parts from fights against rebels. Player can also read more about game world in Codex, which is also included. Game contains complete Czech voice acting by Fénix ProDabing.

Main features

  • Story inspired by Arab Spring
  • Three main heroes with different role in revolution
  • Action and story driven gameplay
  • "Codex" informing about game world
  • Complete Czech voice acting

Contact
